entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
